property.name: printPreferences
property.shortdesc: Print preference settings.

property.name: name
property.shortdesc: The name of the Book.

property.name: fullName
property.shortdesc: The full path to the Book, including the name of the Book.

property.name: filePath
property.shortdesc: The full path to the file.

property.name: modified
property.shortdesc: If true, the Book has been modified since it was last saved.

property.name: saved
property.shortdesc: If true, the Book has been saved since it was created.

property.name: preflightBookOptions
property.shortdesc: Preflight book option settings.

property.name: epubExportPreferences
property.shortdesc: EPub export preference settings.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the Book (a Application).

property.name: index
property.shortdesc: The index of the Book within its containing object.

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: preferences
property.shortdesc: A collection of preferences objects.

property.name: bookContents
property.shortdesc: A collection of book content objects.

property.name: styleSourceDocument
property.shortdesc: Current style source document. Can return: Document or BookContent.

property.name: repaginationOption
property.shortdesc: Page numbering options for book content objects within the book.

property.name: insertBlankPage
property.shortdesc: If true, inserts a blank page as necessary to fill in page number gaps caused by the odd or even specification set in the repagination option.

property.name: automaticPagination
property.shortdesc: If true, automatically updates page numbers when pages in book content files are added, deleted, or rearranged.

property.name: automaticDocumentConversion
property.shortdesc: If true, automatically converts the book content object during repagination and synchronization.

property.name: mergeIdenticalLayers
property.shortdesc: If true, merges identically named layers when exporting to PDF.

property.name: label
property.shortdesc: A property that can be set to any string.

property.name: synchronizeTableOfContentStyle
property.shortdesc: If true, synchronize table of content styles.

property.name: synchronizeTextVariable
property.shortdesc: If true, synchronize text variables.

property.name: synchronizeTableStyle
property.shortdesc: If true, synchronize table styles.

property.name: synchronizeParagraphStyle
property.shortdesc: If true, synchronize paragraph styles.

property.name: synchronizeCharacterStyle
property.shortdesc: If true, synchronize character styles.

property.name: synchronizeTrapStyle
property.shortdesc: If true, synchronize trap styles.

property.name: synchronizeMasterPage
property.shortdesc: If true, synchronize master pages.

property.name: synchronizeObjectStyle
property.shortdesc: If true, synchronize object styles.

property.name: synchronizeSwatch
property.shortdesc: If true, synchronize swatches.

property.name: synchronizeCellStyle
property.shortdesc: If true, synchronize cell styles.

property.name: synchronizeBulletNumberingList
property.shortdesc: If true, synchronize bullets and numbering.

property.name: synchronizeConditionalText
property.shortdesc: If true, synchronize conditional text.

property.name: smartMatchStyleGroups
property.shortdesc: How to match styles with same name while synchronizing a book.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

parameters.name: printDialog
parameters.shortdesc: Whether to invoke the print dialog (Optional)

parameters.name: using
parameters.shortdesc: Printer preset to use. Can accept: PrinterPresetTypes enumerator or PrinterPreset. (Optional)

parameters.name: saving
parameters.shortdesc: Whether to save changes before closing the Book (Optional)

parameters.name: savingIn
parameters.shortdesc: The file in which to save the Book (Optional)

parameters.name: versionComments
parameters.shortdesc: The comment for this version (Optional)

parameters.name: forceSave
parameters.shortdesc: Forcibly save a version (Optional)

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The file path. Note: Required only if the book has not been previously saved. If the book has previously been saved, specifying a path saves a copy and closes the original book. (Optional)

parameters.name: versionComments
parameters.shortdesc: The comment for this version. (Optional)

parameters.name: forceSave
parameters.shortdesc: If true, forcibly saves a version. (Optional)

method.name: exportFile
method.shortdesc: Exports the book to a file.

parameters.name: format
parameters.shortdesc: The export format, specified as an enumeration value or as an extension that appears in the Save as type or Format menu in the Export dialog. Can accept: ExportFormat enumerator or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The file to which to export the book. (Optional)

parameters.name: showingOptions
parameters.shortdesc: Used to specify if the PDF Export Options Dialog needs to be shown or not (Optional)

parameters.name: using
parameters.shortdesc: Used to specify the presets for the export which can be the object of the preset type, enumeration for existing presets or user defined presets, or a string naming the preset to be used, but in case Showing Options is true, the preset specified in the Export Dialog will over ride this parameter (Optional)

parameters.name: whichDocuments
parameters.shortdesc: Used to specify a list of book content references, from the current book, where the list may contain duplicate entries and if the list is not specified then the entire book contents shall be exported (Optional)

parameters.name: versionComments
parameters.shortdesc: The comment for this version. (Optional)

parameters.name: forceSave
parameters.shortdesc: If true, forcibly saves a version. (Optional)

method.name: synchronize
method.shortdesc: Synchronizes the entire book to the style source document.

method.name: insertLabel
method.shortdesc: Sets the label to the value associated with the specified key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.shortdesc: The key.

parameters.name: value
parameters.shortdesc: The value.

method.name: extractLabel
method.shortdesc: Gets the label value associated with the specified key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.shortdesc: The key.

method.name: updateChapterAndParagraphNumbers
method.shortdesc: Updates chapter numbers and paragraph numbers throughout the book.

method.name: updateAllNumbers
method.shortdesc: Update all numbers (e.g. Page numbers, chapter numbers and paragraph numbers) throughout the book.

method.name: updateAllCrossReferences
method.shortdesc: Updates the cross references in the entire book.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The folder, alias, or path in which to place the packaged files.

parameters.name: copyingFonts
parameters.shortdesc: If true, copies fonts used in the document to the package folder.

parameters.name: copyingLinkedGraphics
parameters.shortdesc: If true, copies linked graphics files to the package folder.

parameters.name: copyingProfiles
parameters.shortdesc: If true, copies color profiles to the package folder.

parameters.name: updatingGraphics
parameters.shortdesc: If true, updates graphics links to the package folder.

parameters.name: includingHiddenLayers
parameters.shortdesc: If true, copies fonts and links from hidden layers to the package.

parameters.name: ignorePreflightErrors
parameters.shortdesc: If true, ignores preflight errors and proceeds with the packaging. If false, cancels the packaging when errors exist.

parameters.name: creatingReport
parameters.shortdesc: If true, creates a package report that includes printing instructions, print settings, lists of fonts, links and required inks, and other information.

parameters.name: versionComments
parameters.shortdesc: The comments for the version. (Optional)

parameters.name: forceSave
parameters.shortdesc: If true, forcibly saves a version. (Optional)

method.name: preflight
method.shortdesc: Preflight a book and optionally save the resulting report.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The preflight report to save to. (Optional)

parameters.name: autoOpen
parameters.shortdesc: If true, automatically open the report after creation. (Optional)

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Book.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.shortdesc: The event type.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: captures
parameters.shortdesc: This parameter is obsolete. (Optional)

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event type.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: captures
parameters.shortdesc: This parameter is obsolete. (Optional)
